ResearchProjectDef.label: heat pumps
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Build advanced climate control systems that can both heat and cool using reversible refrigeration cycles. More efficient than separate heating and cooling systems.
Unlocks: • Heat Pump Outdoor Unit - Reversible refrigeration compressor (250W, 120 capacity) • Heat Pump Indoor Unit - Auto-switching temperature control (25W per unit)
Features: • Automatic mode switching at ±2°C from target temperature • Single outdoor unit supports multiple indoor units • All units on same network operate in same mode (heating or cooling) • More efficient than running separate heater + AC systems
Limitations: • Heating disabled when outdoor temperature drops below -25°C (-13°F) • Requires dedicated heat pump duct network (not compatible with regular AC ducts) • Cannot mix heating and cooling modes on same outdoor unit
Ideal for: Year-round climate control with lower power consumption than traditional systems.
